content.question: Which of the following most likely accounts for the extent of the population changes for Argentina, Brazil, and Saudi Arabia in the period 1950–2000 ?

choices.label: The introduction of agricultural techniques associated with the Green Revolution
Religious restrictions on the use of birth control
The implementation of socialist economic policies
The introduction of desalination technologies from Western states

content.answer: The introduction of agricultural techniques associated with the Green Revolution
